object.name: ChatLocation
object.description: Represents a location to which a chat is connected.

object.rst_description: Represents a location to which a chat is connected.

annotations.rst_description: The location to which the supergroup is connected. Can't be a live location.
annotations.name: location

annotations.description: Location address; 1-64 characters, as defined by the chat owner
annotations.html_description: Location address; 1-64 characters, as defined by the chat owner
annotations.rst_description: Location address; 1-64 characters, as defined by the chat owner
annotations.name: address
